articles.author: Ashish Dangwal
articles.title: ‘Significant Movement’! Russia Begins Receiving Artillery From North Korea To Support Ukraine War – Reports - EurAsian Times
articles.description: North Korea has purportedly begun the transfer of artillery to Russia, a move that highlights its intention to strengthen Russian forces participating in the ongoing invasion of Ukraine.
articles.content: In recent satellite imagery, a notable uptick in railway movement along the border shared by North Korea and Russia has emerged, suggesting that North Korea is delivering munitions to Russia, accordi… [+7695 chars]
